item.title: EP 564 - The Demon Behind Your Closet Door
item.itunes:title: The Demon Behind Your Closet Door
item.description:
Today we meet a woman with a bizarre alibi, and then we travel to your bedroom to open your super spooky closet at 3am!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Links:

Las Vegas woman accused of killing daughters because organs ‘worth a lot of money’

https://nypost.com/2020/11/11/las-vegas-woman-accused-of-killing-her-two-daughters/?utm_source=knewz

Arrest report: Father told Las Vegas police mother drowned 2 children; mother denied having kids

https://www.fox5vegas.com/news/crime/arrest-report-father-told-las-vegas-police-mother-drowned-2-children-mother-denied-having-kids/article_898a116c-22d2-11eb-8651-ff231a4ca35c.html?fbclid=IwAR15eQChobNe1DbrjsYSBig0sdOhJD4RM_1JN_MqLa4DnnUK7qTlAvOpFUM

Eaton Township Weis Markets shooting

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eaton_Township_Weis_Markets_shooting

Ghost Stories, the Paranormal and the Strange

https://www.trueghosttales.com/

Scary Accounts of Real Monsters in the Closet

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2018/09/scary-accounts-of-real-monsters-in-the-closet/

Doorways, Closets, Windows and Shadows–Entrances to Our Side?

https://magickfortherealworld.wordpress.com/2012/10/15/doorways-closets-windows-and-shadows-entrances-to-our-side/

Monsters in the closet

https://www.todaysparent.com/kids/preschool/monsters-in-the-closet/

Ghost Story: The Girl Hanging in the Closet

https://ghostsandstories.com/ghost-story-the-girl-hanging-in-the-closet.html

Why Walking through a Doorway Makes You Forget

https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/why-walking-through-doorway-makes-you-forget/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
